attributes.action: deplore the use of e-petitions to generate free publicity for unproven treatments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concerned to see petitions calling for as yet unproven medical treatments to be made available on the NHS, e.g. e.g. http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/freefoodtests/ or http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Buteyko-4-free/#detail )
